S04n404:1: atha padmottamastathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho avalokiteśvarametadavocat–dadasva me kulaputra ṣaḍakṣarīṃ mahāvidyāṃ rājñīm,
S04n404:4: athe avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ padmottamasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyemāṃ ṣaḍakṣarīṃ mahāvidyāmanuprayacchati–
S04n404:11: yasmin kāle iyaṃ ṣaḍakṣarī mahāvidyā anupradattā,
S04n404:16: atha padmottamena tathāgatena bhujaṃgasadṛśaṃ bāhuṃ prasārya avalokiteśvarasya śatasahasramūlyaṃ muktāhāram,
S04n404:18: tena gṛhītvā tasya padmottamasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyopanāmitam |
S04n404:19: atha padmottamastathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha imāṃ ṣaḍakṣarīṃ mahāvidyāṃ gṛhītvā yena patrottamo nāma lokadhātustenopasaṃkrāntaḥ |
S04n404:20: evaṃ kulaputra mayā bhūtapūrvaṃ padmottamasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasva sakāśācchrutam ||
S04n404:21: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bhagavantametadavocat-kathaṃ bhagavan labheyaṃ ṣaḍakṣarīṃ mahāvidyā rājñīṃ prāptayogasya ?
S04n404:22: yathā hi bhagavannamṛtasya labdhāsvādāstṛptiṃ na labhante,
S04n404:23: evamahaṃ bhagavan ṣaḍakṣarimahāvidyāśrutamātreṇa tṛptiṃ na labhāma |
S04n404:24: puṇyavantaste sattvā ya imāṃ ṣaḍakṣarīṃ mahāvidyāṃ japanti śṛṇvanti cintayanti adhyāśayena dhārayanti ||
S04n404:28: paramāṇurajopamānāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ divyasauvarṇaratnamayān stūpān kārayet,
S04n404:33: yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāḥ ṣaḍakṣarīṃ mahāvidyāṃ japet,
S04n404:43: dhyānālaṃkāro nāma samādhiḥ dharmarathābhirūḍho nāma samādhiḥ,
